import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Button, Card } from 'react-materialize' import Iframe from 'react-iframe' const SnippetView = ({styleSheet, snippetId, snippets, generateStyleSheet}) => { const div = { height: '33vh', width: '100%', padding: '5%', background: 'rgb(48,48,48)', border: '3px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', } const bottomDiv = { height: '72vh', width: '100%', marginTop: '5%', background: 'white', border: '5px solid teal', color: 'white', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'scroll', resize: 'both', } const foundSnippet = () => { let returnSnip = snippets.find(snip =>{ return snip.id === snippetId }) return returnSnip } return (
Generate Stylesheet}> {styleSheet && styleSheet.filename}
HTML
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().html }
CSS
{ (snippets.length>0) && foundSnippet().css }
) } export default SnippetView;
